Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/all: The Dragonguard are lucky to have you as an ally.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/bad: Luc accidentally let his beetles out, and my frog got away, and Mr. Errol did NOT like any of that.
We got into big trouble last time we went to the museum.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/bal: A mighty force, huh? She must get it from me!
Mister Balor said he would normally let us play in the rain, but Mom is a mighty force who he must never cross.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/bed: My favorite bedtime story is Beginner's Sword Manual, but mom won't read it to me anymore... I wonder why.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/buy: And I order you to buy a potato!
Today I am the boss of the general store, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/cel: My big sister is pretty amazing!
Celine knows so much about plants and stuff...
I like when Celine tells us really old stories about Aldaria.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/din: Dinner is yummy tonight! That makes it Dragonguard approved.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/dra: From now on you'll be known as... THE DRAGON'S TAIL!
You're an honorary member of the Dragonguard, [Ari]. And a true friend.
Mister March taught me that word. It means sword room!
Hi, [Ari]! Welcome to the Dragonguard armory!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/eve: Second dinner, midnight snack, second midnight snack...
I could eat cake for every meal... breakfast, lunch, dinner, dessert...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/evi: Luc's spies say that evil wizard who's making it rain is hiding in the fountain...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/fou: I really wanna jump in the fountain, but I don't wanna get in trouble with Mom again... which is why I'm gonna jump in when it's raining! Perfect crime!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/fre: My dad told me to say that.
Every purchase comes with a free smile!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/goi: I want to stay up and play, but mom says I have to go to bed...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/gre: That place is haunted you know... haunted with monsters! I swear I saw one hiding behind a tree!
Let me know if you have any trouble and I can take care of them for you.
Hello! Are you the one moving to the old farm? I'm Dell!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/hun: Grownups always say we're lucky to play all day, but playing is hard work! I'm hungry and sleepy!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/i_w: I want candy for dinner... I'm allowed, right?
I can't wait till I'm old enough to do quests from the board... it'll be a new era for the Dragonguard!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/imp: Hey! Did Lady Adeline really give you a sword? That's so COOL!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/luc: Luc is our bug expert! I wonder if he could train his bugs to be the Dragonguard's spy network...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/mer: Oh, wait, no... the other half is a fish too.
Maple, Luc, over here! Look! It's a mermaid!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/mor: I asked mom to pack me extra food this morning!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/nee: Mom says the fastest way to get strong is to sleep lots, which makes sense cause I always catch Errol napping at the museum. And he's real strong!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/new: We should find an actual dragon! Do you know where we can find one?
Hi [Ari]! I was just thinking about the Dragonguard's next adventure.
I'll put in a good word for you next time we have an opening.
You'd make a great member of the Dragonguard, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/no_: I wanted to ask Mr. Errol about cool swords, but he kept talking about old pots...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/pro: Look alive, Dragonguard! We have to protect the town!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/put: They won't even let me put candy in the stew! Candy is a perfectly acceptable crouton!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/rai: I always collect as much mud as I can when it rains.
But outside is where the adventures are!
Mom said I'll catch a cold if I play outside.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/rea: Let me know if I can help you, [Ari]! And maybe you can help me... reach the counter.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/sno: After today, I'm all snowed out.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/ter: She showed us how to tie knots from when she was a sailor!
Terithia sure knows a lot about adventuring!
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/tra: I can train you in the ways of the sword and stuff, [Ari]. If you want!
I keep telling Dad that I'm not playing, I'm TRAINING, but he keeps forgetting.
I gotta do something really impressive so Lady Adeline will knight me too...
I have questions about potions, and I know just who to ask...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/wee: You GOTTA tell me if you do! The Dragonguard helps anyone in need!
Are you still clearing out your farm, [Ari]? Have you found any monsters?
There's SO many adventures in Mistria, [Ari]!
You're new here, so I'll tell you a secret...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/wer: Together, we're the Dragonguard of Mistria!
I'm the Dragon's Claw, Maple is the Dragon's Fang, and Luc is the Dragon's Wing.
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Banked Lines/you: You look sooo tired! Why don't grown-ups do nap time?
